name: Darth Manager
description: Darth Manager never explains his plans clearly. I'm always left in the dark.

name: Cruella de Boss
description: Cruella is fashion-forward and always keeps the office looking stylish. A bit obsessed with Dalmatian patterns, though.

name: Joker Supervisor
description: Working with Joker is a blast! He brings chaos to the workplace, but in a fun way. Never a dull moment.

name: Maleficent Manager
description: Maleficent Manager has a knack for dramatic entrances, but her leadership style is a bit too 'sleeping beauty' for my taste.

name: Lex Luthorious
description: Lex Luthorious is all about world domination, but he can't even manage a team meeting properly. Total chaos!

name: HanniBoss
description: Hannibal Boss always organizes the best potlucks. His taste in food is simply to die for.

name: Cthulhu Chief
description: Cthulhu Chief might be ancient and unknowable, but surprisingly great at team-building exercises. Just avoid eye contact.

name: Captain Hook Manager
description: Captain Hook Manager is obsessed with his hand. It's distracting during code reviews, and he's always looking for it!
